I'm Going to Disneyland! June 2011

This was an early project I worked on while I was a front end intern at Dachis Group in Portland. I took an old Facebook tab written in FBML and converted it to a full-fledged Sinatra application hosted on a cloud server. I did some further work on a sister application when Disney hosted a “Moms Panel” using Disneyworld’s facebook tab as a primary point of entry. That event saw well over 100,000 visitors in a short period of time, testing the limits of our servers and the quality of our code.

Client: Disney

Agency: Dachis
